1. Multiple semesters of free therapy/mental health counseling for students.
2. More spaces for quiet study in Price Gilbert/Crossland. 
3. Student in ECE should not have a lower priority to take required CS classes for their thread
4. ECE curriculum needs some work
5. Classes being recorded so that you can look back when studying 
6. Stricter rules on preventing work around Spring Break and other long breaks. Professors often give so much work due the week after Spring Break that Spring Break is not really a break. , 
7. There is a lack of school pride. School pride often is caused from winning sports, which Georgia Tech lacks. This means I believe Georgia Tech should put a larger emphasis on sports or looking for other ways to increase school pride and alumni support. , 
8. A more accessible bar scene. It would increase both the safety of students as well as create a bond within the student body if there were easily accessible student bars or clubs. This could include a mark system to where students younger than twenty-one still can participate but not get drinks due to a mark on their hand (Other colleges to this) , 
9. Dorms need to be cleaned. I lived in Hopkins and there was an insane amount of mold that consistently kept me and my roommates sick. As soon as we moved out, our health improved drastically. , 
10. Update courses. A lot of courses do not seem to prepare individuals for the workforce and use very outdated technologies. There should be able a larger flexibility in electives students can take.

1. Time Stability-Work on building a schedule/pattern that pushes you slightly ahead in classes (it will build up in time), 2. Easier auditing- Ask professors about classes and they might be able to direction to relevant information, 3. Manageable work load- Spread out your homework across the week instead of completing it all in one go, 4.More consistent transportation- Depending on if you are near campus, you could walk (which is always reliable) and you would get some exercise along with it, 5. More opportunities to connect with people-you could Join a club, VIP, or talk with people during labs.
